description:
One of Boréal’s top selling boats, the Epsilon is a reliable, controllable and fun kayak for paddlers of all skill levels. Outfitted with multiple storage hatches and sealed bulkheads this touring boat has plenty of room for your gear. A fully padded, adjustable seat keeps you comfy on long paddles. And should a little water get in the cockpit, the seat is perforated and dries quickly, so you won’t end up sitting in a puddle. Even fully loaded the Epsilon series tracks well and slices through the water with ease.

  • Light and strong polyethylene construction
  • High bow line reduces incoming spray when you’re breaking waves
  • Durable rubber hatches seal out the water to keep your gear dry
  • Day hatch keeps your precious cargo close
  • Waterproof sealed bulkheads for easy storage and hull rigidity
  • Bungee cargo nets keep needed gear close, or charts in place
  • High visibility deck lines help keep you seen on low-light paddles
  • Paddler-side line lets you raise or lower the rudder without having to turn to face the rear deck
  • Molded paddle rest in front of the cockpit
  • Padded thigh braces and seat
  • Back pad acts like a backband offering solid support for your lower back
  • Adjustable footrests
  • Soft chines mean predictable and controllable tracking
  • Self-rescue straps help get you back in the boat
name: Boréal Designs Epsilon P300 Kayak
